column4: Hi, I am running Ubuntu - I installed the 'kubunt-desktop' dummy package cause I wanted to try out KDE. I want to know how can I get my old "ubuntu" splash/boot screens back instead of the Kubuntu ones I have now?
sudo update-alternatives --config gdm for the login
if you want the gdm login,  sudo dpkg-reconfigure gdm
i use auto-login so the GDM screen does not bother me, cheers anyway
